Welcome to the Trident Esports Community Discord. Please read the below information to open up the rest of the server.
:small_blue_diamond: Be respectful and do not oppress any individuals.
:small_blue_diamond: Do not harass, annoy, or become a nuisance to any individuals.
:small_blue_diamond: Please do not `@USER` repeatedly. We are all human, nobody would appreciate being spammed.
:small_blue_diamond: Be mindful of your actions. Negative actions may impact on some individuals.
:small_blue_diamond: Do not discriminate. Zero Tolerance for any behavior in this category as well as bullying. Will be met with a ban instantaneously.
:small_blue_diamond: Do not challenge `@Moderators`. If they tell you to stop doing something, please stop.
:small_blue_diamond: Please refrain from using any inappropriate nicknames. Nicknames may be changed by `@Moderators` on a case-by-case basis.
:small_blue_diamond: Do not post spams or NSFW. Will be met with a warning or a ban.
:small_blue_diamond: Do not self promote. Will be met with a warning!
:small_blue_diamond: Lastly, enjoy your time here. You're now apart of the Trident family!
